about_the_game:
Martha's Dolls is a first-person horror game where you play as a player who has ventured into an abandoned village rumored to be cursed by the haunted dolls of an old woman named Martha. The village is full of these dolls, and those who enter the village are never able to leave.

Your goal is to investigate the village and uncover the secrets behind Martha's dolls and the curse that plagues the village. However, you must be careful, as the dolls are not to be underestimated. They are said to be possessed by Martha's vengeful spirit, and they will stop at nothing to protect their village and its secrets.

As you explore the village, you will encounter a variety of different dolls, each with its own unique abilities and behaviors. Some dolls will simply wander the village, while others will actively hunt you down. You will need to use your wits and survival skills to avoid the dolls and stay alive.

In addition to the dolls, you will also need to be wary of the village itself. The village is full of traps and hazards, and it is easy to get lost in its maze-like streets. You will need to carefully navigate the village and avoid the traps in order to find your way out.

Martha's Dolls is a challenging and suspenseful horror game that will test your nerves. If you are looking for a truly terrifying experience, then Martha's Dolls is the game for you.



Here are some of the features of Martha's Dolls:

- Variety of different dolls, each with its own unique abilities and behaviors.
- Challenging and suspenseful horror experience.
- Maze-like village full of traps and hazards.
- Dark and atmospheric world to explore.
- Gripping story to uncover.
- Realistic Horror Experience !
- All what you need ( Inventory System , Player Items , Puzzles ...)


If you are a fan of horror games, then Martha's Dolls is a must-play. It is a truly terrifying and unforgettable experience.

name: Martha's Dolls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3‑4170 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 710 , 1 GB | AMD Radeon R7 250, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780, 3 GB | AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Dive into the adventures in " Merphy Town " where Martha's Dolls lives , solve the mystery , prepare yourself for a great horror experience !
